effect.shortEffect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.
effect.full: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
description.platinum: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
description.black-white: The Pokémon can check a foe’s held item.
description.black-2-white-2: The Pokémon can check a foe’s held item.
description.x-y: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
description.sun-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
description.sword-shield: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s held item.
